Class P4_Evangelista_Andrew_House

java.lang.Object
P4_Evangelista_Andrew_House
Record Components:
width - width of the house.
x - X position of the middle of the house
y - Position of y value bottom of the house
pad - You need to put your sketchpad name in here that you used for gpdraw. ...
public class P4_Evangelista_Andrew_House extends Object
This class draws a basic 3dish house, takes in parameters width, x , y , and pad.

Example Usage: 
    P4_Evangelista_Andrew_House house = new P4_Evangelista_Andrew_House(300,-50,pad);
    house.draw(300,-50,0,pad);
    house.draw(30,350,100,pad);
